content: HANOI A private-equity arm of Standard Chartered Plc and Goldman Sachs have invested a combined $28 million in Vietnamese startup M_Service  the operator of mobile e-wallet MoMo  the companies said in a joint statement on Thursday.
name: Momo Inc
title: StanChart PE arm  Goldman invest $28 million in Vietnam fintech startup

content: HANOI  March 17 A private-equity arm of Standard Chartered Plc and Goldman Sachs have invested a combined $28 million in Vietnamese startup M_Service  the operator of mobile e-wallet MoMo  the companies said in a joint statement on Thursday.
name: Momo Inc
title: StanChart PE arm  Goldman invest $28 mln in Vietnam fintech startup

name: Momo Inc
title: China's IPO curbs risk $32 billion of U.S. take-private deals

content: June 23 The following bids  mergers  acquisitions and disposals were reported by 2000 GMT on Tuesday:
name: Momo Inc
title: Deals of the day- Mergers and acquisitions

content: Momo Inc's  chief executive and a group of investment firms offered to buy all shares of the Chinese mobile chat app company they do not already own for $1.9 billion  six months after the company listed in the United States.
name: Momo Inc
title: Chinese chat app Momo gets buyout offer from CEO

content: June 23 Momo Inc's chief executive and a group of investment firms offered to buy all shares of the Chinese mobile chat app company they do not already own for $1.9 billion  six months after the company listed in the United States.
name: Momo Inc
title: UPDATE 2-Chinese chat app Momo gets buyout offer from CEO

content: June 23 Chinese mobile chat app company Momo Inc  said Chief Executive Yan Tang and three investment firms had proposed taking the company private for $3.6 billion.
name: Momo Inc
title: China's Momo chat app firm says CEO offers buyout
